items.title: CEO of South Korean retail giant Coupang resigns after massive data breach
items.creator: Zack Whittaker
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: CEO of South Korean retail giant Coupang resigns after massive data breach

images.alt: A general view shows the logo of South Korean online delivery service Coupang, at a building housing the headquarters of Coupang in Seoul on December 9, 2025. South Korean police raided the Seoul headquarters of e-commerce giant Coupang on December 9, over a recent data leak believed to have affected almost two-thirds of the country's population.

items.content: The massive data breach at the South Korean retail giant Coupang affects more than half of the country's population.

items.title: Marco Rubio bans Calibri font at State Department for being too DEI
items.creator: Julie Bort
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: Marco Rubio bans Calibri font at State Department for being too DEI
items.content: Calibri, which could make documents easier to read for the vision impaired, was apparently installed in 2023 by the department’s then-DEI office. Rubio’s memo has designated Times New Roman as his tenure’s official font, stating it will “restore decorum and professionalism” to documents.

items.title: Amazon changes how copyright protection is applied to Kindle Direct’s self-published ebooks (原标题: Amazon changes how copyright protection is applied to Kindle Direct’s self-published e-books)
items.creator: Sarah Perez
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: Amazon changes how copyright protection is applied to Kindle Direct’s self-published ebooks
items.content: Amazon says it will allow authors to offer their DRM-free e-books in the EPUB and PDF formats through its self-publishing platform, Kindle Direct Publishing. Starting on January 20, 2026, authors who set their titles as DRM-free will see their books made available in these more open formats.
